Author: lilmissdisappearing
Text: Lmao I know me, my ghost is gonna show up at my funeral to worry whether i look fat in the coffin   I hope I end up a happy, plump, sweet grandma who bakes cookies for everyone and gets ice cream when the kids do. Just honestly cannot imagine going from here to there, even in that many years

Author: oh-em-jizzles
Text: lol i was just thinking about that ! someone has been posting about their shitlord grandma (or boyfriend's grandma maybe?? cant remember) and im just like... i HOPE im eating what i want by then bc i hopefully wont give a shit if im a little overweight at that point in my life
